home.title: Why salmon and tuna are different

pages.title: The two most consumed fish in the world are salmon and tuna.
And to understand their impact, we need to dive into their world.
What is the biggest issue around salmon and tuna?
pages.subtitle: compared to the average diet

answerExplanation.text:
Salmon and tuna eat other fish and are true carnivores. They are high in the food chain. This makes their role in the ecosystem extra important, but also more vulnerable.

Because you need to feed salmon with other fish, more than twice the amount of fish is needed for a piece of (raised) salmon. So it‚Äôs much more sustainable to eat smaller fish.
